full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tenders**
### Bid Opportunity

* **Oppportunity Title: Accommodations - Borrego Springs, California*
* **Reference Number: W6399-22CA45/B*
* **Publication Date: November 28, 2022*
* **Closing Date: March 31, 2027, 14:00:00 (EST)*

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking quotations for accommodations in the Borrego Springs, California area.

**Requirement Description:**
DND requires hotel or motel accommodations for an estimated 31 personnel, with a variety of check-in and check-out dates, over a period of two months. The expected stay duration is between 12 days and 35 days.

**Bidder Guidelines:**
The Crown invites all interested suppliers to submit a bid.  
Bidders may request an information package by contacting Sean Webster at [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca) or by visiting the procurement site at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Eligibility Requirements:**
Suppliers must be registered suppliers with the Government of Canada, and meet the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Duration of Contract:**
Supply Arrangements will be issued to all suppliers whose bids have been deemed compliant to this RFSA. The period for awarding contracts under the Supply Arrangement is from the date of issue to March 31, 2027. 

**Submit Your Bid:**
Bids must be submitted in accordance with the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document. The bid submission deadline is March 31, 2027, at 14:00:00 (EST).

**Help and Resources:**
For assistance with bid submission, contact Sean Webster at [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the procurement site at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). 

### Notice
This bid opportunity is open to all interested suppliers. No prior experience in the Government of Canada's system is required. 

### Contact Information
Sean Webster  
Email: [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca)  
Phone: (873)
